descriptions:
Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made from high-quality Cedar Wood, this nesting box is perfect for outdoor use. The construction of this box ensures durability, as it is both glued and nailed together.

Featuring a beautifully burned image of a squirrel by renowned artist Drew Senesac, this box adds a decorative touch to any outdoor space. The removable roof allows for easy access and cleaning, ensuring a comfortable and safe environment for the squirrels.

Mounting hardware is included with this squirrel house, making installation a breeze. The box comes with pre-drilled holes and includes screws and washers for secure mounting.

The dimensions of the Squirrel House/Nesting Box are as follows: the outside measures 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth. The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches.

Give your furry friends a cozy home with the Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Place it in your garden or backyard and enjoy watching the squirrels make themselves at home!

Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box! Made from high-quality Cedar wood, this nesting box is perfect for outdoor use. It is expertly constructed with both glued and nailed joints, ensuring durability and longevity.

Featuring a unique burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac, this nesting box adds a touch of charm to any outdoor space. The roof is conveniently removable, allowing for easy cleaning and maintenance. Plus, all the necessary mounting hardware, including screws and washers, are included for hassle-free installation.

With dimensions of 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth, the Squirrel House/Nesting Box provides ample space for squirrels to make themselves at home. The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth, ensuring a cozy interior for nesting. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, allowing squirrels easy access to their new home.

The Squirrel House/Nesting Box is designed with convenience in mind. It comes with pre-drilled holes for easy mounting, and the included screws and washers make installation a breeze. The sturdy construction and thoughtful design features make this nesting box a perfect addition to any outdoor space.

Provide a safe and comfortable home for squirrels with the Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Order yours today and enjoy watching these adorable creatures thrive in their new abode!

The removable roof of the squirrel house allows for easy access and cleaning, ensuring a comfortable and hygienic environment for your furry friends. Additionally, all the necessary mounting hardware, including screws and washers, is included, making installation a breeze.

In terms of dimensions, the outside of the squirrel house measures 12 inches in width, 11 inches in height, and 10 inches in depth. The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth, providing a cozy space for squirrels to nest. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, perfectly suited for their entry and exit.

With pre-drilled holes and the included mounting hardware, setting up this squirrel house is hassle-free. Simply secure it to your desired location, and you'll soon have squirrels enjoying their new home.

Invest in the comfort and well-being of squirrels with our Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Create a welcoming habitat for these adorable creatures while adding a touch of natural beauty to your outdoor space. Order yours today!

The construction of this squirrel house ensures durability, as it is both glued and nailed together. It features a beautiful burned image of a squirrel, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. The removable roof allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring a comfortable living environment for the squirrels.

Mounting this squirrel house is a breeze with the included pre-drilled holes, screws, and washers. You'll have everything you need to securely attach it to a tree or any other suitable surface.

The inside dimensions are 5.75 inches in width and 9 inches in depth. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, providing a perfect entrance for the furry inhabitants.
